text: (The) shaggy dog may refer to: * The Shaggy Dog (1959 movie), starring Fred MacMurray and Tommy Kirk * The Shaggy Dog (1994 movie), a made-for-TV remake starring Ed Begley, Jr. and Scott Weinger * The Shaggy Dog (2006 movie), a Disney live-action theatrical remake starring Tim Allen
title: Shaggy dog
